alert.note: Alert for Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 3:36AM MST until December 31 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches with localized accumulations of 6 to 8 inches possible over the higher terrain east of Lewiston. * WHERE...Lewiston, Clarkston, Pomeroy, Lewiston Grade, Gifford, Lapwai, Alpowa Summit, Culdesac, and Peck. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
